mysteryDungeon:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
mysteryDungeon:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.
DESCRIPTIONS: [#2aecd7]Usable [#2aecd7]once [#2aecd7]per [#2aecd7]turn.[] NL #yEvoke your rightmost Orb.
YOU ARE MINE!

mysteryDungeon:NatureRelatedRelic.NAME: Nature Related Relic
DESCRIPTIONS: You will receive a relic that depends on your nature.

mysteryDungeon:BigRootRelic.NAME: Big Root
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you are at #b70% or less of your max HP, gain #yRecovery.

mysteryDungeon:BraveExplorerRelic.NAME: Brave Explorer
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you don't have any #yBlock at the end of your turn apply #b2 #yVulnerable to ALL enemies.

mysteryDungeon:CalmExplorerRelic.NAME: Calm Explorer
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw #b1 card and gain [E] at the start of every fight.

mysteryDungeon:CellBatteryRelic.NAME: Cell Battery
mysteryDungeon:CellBatteryRelic.FLAVOR: A consumable battery. If the holder is hit by an Electric-type move, its Attack will rise.
DESCRIPTIONS: The charge meter will now have 3 steps between stances. NL You no longer return to the center of the charge meter at the start of your turn.

mysteryDungeon:CharcoalRelic.NAME: Charcoal
mysteryDungeon:CharcoalRelic.FLAVOR: It's a combustible fuel that boosts the power of Fire-type moves.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you apply a #ydebuff deal #b1 damage to ALL enemies.

mysteryDungeon:DocileExplorerRelic.NAME: Docile Explorer
DESCRIPTIONS: When you receive a #yDebuff, gain #b2 Block on the following turn.

mysteryDungeon:FlameOrbRelic.NAME: Flame Orb
mysteryDungeon:FlameOrbRelic.FLAVOR: It's a bizarre orb that will afflict the holder with a burn during battle.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, apply #b9 #yBurn to ALL enemies.

mysteryDungeon:GrassySeedRelic.NAME: Grassy Seed
mysteryDungeon:GrassySeedRelic.FLAVOR: It boosts Defense on Grassy Terrain.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat add a random attack to your draw pile. It costs 0 this combat.

mysteryDungeon:HardyExplorerRelic.NAME: Hardy Explorer
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you lose HP each turn, gain 5 Block. If this HP loss was from a monster's attack, gain 1 Blur

mysteryDungeon:ImpishExplorerRelic.NAME: Impish Explorer
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you evoke an orb each combat, gain a #yFocus.

mysteryDungeon:JollyExplorerRelic.NAME: Jolly Explorer
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with an #yAgility.

mysteryDungeon:LeftoversRelic.NAME: Leftovers
mysteryDungeon:LeftoversRelic.FLAVOR: Some food left form your last meal
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of combat heal #b3 HP.

mysteryDungeon:LifeOrbRelic.NAME: Life Orb
mysteryDungeon:LifeOrbRelic.FLAVOR: It boosts the power of moves, but at the cost of some HP on each hit.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. NL At the end of your turn, exhaust a random card from your hand.

mysteryDungeon:MetronomeRelic.NAME: Metronome
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of every turn add a random card from Pokémon that are not in your team to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

mysteryDungeon:MeadowPlateRelic.NAME: Meadow Plate
mysteryDungeon:MeadowPlateRelic.FLAVOR: A stone tablet imbued with the essence of plants. When used on a certain Pokémon, it allows that Pokémon to gain the power of the Grass type.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 20 max HP. At the start of combat if you are above 65% HP lose HP until you are not. If you are under 65% of your max HP, heal 10HP.

mysteryDungeon:MiracleSeedRelic.NAME: Miracle Seed
mysteryDungeon:MiracleSeedRelic.FLAVOR: Its a seed invued with life force that boosts the power of Grass-type moves.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you apply #b3 #ydebuffs in a single turn draw a card.

mysteryDungeon:MysticWaterRelic.NAME: Mystic Water
mysteryDungeon:MysticWaterRelic.FLAVOR: This teardrop-shaped gem boosts the power of Water-type moves.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. NL Reduce your maximum hand size by 2.

mysteryDungeon:NaiveExplorerRelic.NAME: Naive Explorer
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, if you have not taken any damage from attacks this combat, your next Attack deals 3 more damage.

mysteryDungeon:QuirkyExplorerRelic.NAME: Quirky Explorer
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 5% more Gold in combat rewards.

mysteryDungeon:RelaxedExplorerRelic.NAME: Relaxed Explorer
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, #yscry #b1.

mysteryDungeon:TimidExplorerRelic.NAME: Timid Explorer
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of each turn, if you have any leftover energy, spend 1 to retain 1 card.

mysteryDungeon:LightBallRelic.NAME: Light Ball
mysteryDungeon:LightBallRelic.FLAVOR: It's a puzzling orb that boosts its Attack and Sp. Atk stats.
DESCRIPTIONS: Once per turn, when you play a power and you are not in a stance, gain 1 orb slot.

mysteryDungeon:WaveIncenseRelic.NAME: Wave Incense
mysteryDungeon:WaveIncenseRelic.FLAVOR: Its a seed invued with life force that boosts the power of Grass-type moves.
DESCRIPTIONS: Each battle apply the #yMaster #yReality power.
